issue.title: [Rust] Implement Date and Time Arrays
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-4386](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4386). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
We have added date/time types, but have not yet created arrays for these types. See discussion: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/3340#issuecomment-452226570

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4386?focusedCommentId=16787344) by Chao Sun (csun):*
Issue resolved by pull request 3726
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/3726>
